headline: The Southern Company (SO): Close to Becoming a Dividend Aristocrat

headline: XLU: The Perfect Blend To Buy
summary: XLU is an exchange-traded fund that strictly invests in utilities companies that are included in the S&P 500. Click here to find out why I rate XLU a buy.
